modName: Azog the Pale companion The Hobbit
summary: Adds Azog the Pale, the Goblin/Orc from the movie The Hobbit
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1300.photobucket.com/albums/ag88/scottaiel/AzogPortada_zps8f471c06.png[/IMG]

He is a fearless warrior, a giant bad... pale orc with great strengh and skill at the arts of war.
If you make him your follower, you will be able to rise him in lvl from 20 to 81 ! So he could be a \"whole time\" companion.
Inspired in Azog from the Hobbit movie, he has greater tall than average, but that does not makes any mess or bug as far as i know (dungeon tested)

_Located at Falkreath main door entrance

Hope you have a good time, this mod is a request from the original mod where he belongs(as a final boss, not companion) [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28522]The Uruk hai Wars[/url]

*Credits to Bethesda for making the best game ever
*Credits to Nexus Site for having such a strong buil community
author: Scotaiel
